title: Solve my math problem GD: 2A + B = 2A
body:
GD, I need your combined mental academic skills to solve this Algebra 1 problem for my little sister. I have never seen anything like it.

1. Solve 2A + B = 2A
2. A and B must both be nonzero real numbers

I know if B = 0, then 2A = 2A which satisfies all nonzero real numbers, however this breaks the second rule. Please halp.
